<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>4.5</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>4</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>1.2</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mn>6</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">(4.5 \times {10^4}) \times (1.2 \times {10^6})</annotation></semantics></math>
